entry.title: Bad men die
entry.summary:
Author: authorettejasmin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,341Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 546

Summary: I do not sleep; a symbol burns out in the sky and my body tingles, sweats cold and aches bone-deep. The arms around me squeeze tighter and I feel him shake behind me.The one who calls me brother.The one who calls me Jason.He loves me, protects me and even though I don't remember who I am or how I got here, I know one thing.A bad man is trying to hurt him.And bad men should die.¬†Jason digs his way out and Talia may find him first, but she isn't the one who keeps him.

entry.title: In The Darkest Of Times
entry.summary:
Author: AnonDude

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,531Chapters: 19/19Kudos: 12

Summary: On the way back to the police station after his lunch break, Dick stops to help a civilian. Which turns out to be the absolute worst mistake of his life and the beginning of the week from the deepest, darkest depths of hell.Dick has been through a lot in his life, a lot of terrible things, but somehow he always managed to make it through ‚Äî somehow he always stubbornly clung on to hope and forged his way forward through life.He's not sure he's that person anymore.When Jason finally finds him and brings him home, it turns out the road to recovery is a long, tiring, and very rocky one. But it also turns out Dick maybe has a lot more help than he thought. And just possibly romance isn't completely out of the cards as much as he'd originally assumed.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 429,304Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 1,103

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SaviouroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 211,394Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 573

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he‚Äôs encountered‚Äîdisciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.
